first_translate: I think I knew all along...
the reason why you accepted me was because...

hangle: 어렸을 때 봐왔던 정 때문이었단 걸.
first_translate: ...of our childhood memories together.
it’s because she didn’t want to lose me...

hangle: 반짝였던 우리의 어린 시절을 소중히 이어 나가고 싶었기 때문이었다는 것을.
first_translate: and wanted us to continue cherishing those happy moments we shared as children.
until now,
because I always wanted to stay by your side,
I tried not to think about this too much.
but if my presence is a burden for you,
or hurts you,
then even at this moment,
right here--
is that what you’re trying to say?
why are you doing this?
doesn’t he know better than anyone else?

hangle: 그러면 시그렌과 만나는 관계가 부담스러운 건가?
first_translate: was meeting up with siegren such a heavy weight on his shoulders?
that would make sense...
siegren must have heard everything when gunther spoke to him earlier.
that's why he wants to break things off with me.
if I were to look at this calmly,
this situation is exactly how I had hoped it’d turn out.

hangle: 원래의 나는 시그렌을 그저 내가 쓴 소설의 남자주인공으로만 생각했고,
first_translate: in the beginning, I only thought of siegren as the male lead from my novel,
and believed being lovers was just temporary.

hangle: 언젠간 원작대로 돌아갈 것이라고 되뇌고 있었어.
first_translate: I kept telling myself that eventually, things will go back to their original course.
so this makes perfect sense.

hangle: 내심 정해왔던 끝이 마침내 왔을 뿐.
first_translate: all that happened today was something I already expected deep down inside.
but still...

hangle: 정말 지금도 시그렌은 내게 원작의 남자 주인공 뿐인 걸까?
first_translate: do I really see siegren as nothing more than the main character of my story anymore?
fiona,
if my existence becomes a burden for you,
I’ll stop everything right away.
I understand.
just like how I got hurt by siegren,
he also felt pain because of me.

hangle: 이미 정해져 있는 대답을 내가 괜히 물은 걸까.
first_translate: maybe I shouldn’t have asked him anything since I already knew what his answer would be.
okay then.
goodbye,
fiona.
wait.
don’t leave, siegren.
my intention wasn’t to hurt you.

hangle: 나를 걱정해서, 나를 좋아하기 때문에 그런 말을 한 걸 알아.
first_translate: I know you said that because you care about me and love me so dearly.

hangle: 하지만 내가 써 내린 세계에 대한 책임이 있으니 네 걱정을 모른 척했어.
first_translate: but I pretended not to notice your concern because I feel responsible for the world I created.

hangle: 사실 난 그저. 겁이 난 것뿐일지도 몰라,
first_translate: to tell you the truth, maybe I’m simply scared.
as time goes by, you become increasingly precious to me,
yet I keep thinking that one day, I'll need to let you go.

hangle: 너의 행복을 위한 길은 원작대로 돌아가게 만드는 것이라고 생각하고 또 생각했어.
first_translate: I've been convinced that returning to the original storyline is the way to ensure your happiness.
but honestly speaking,
can I truly afford to send you away?
could I ever do that?
of course not.
now that I realize the ending I’ve desired...

hangle: 내게 아무것도 아니지 않았다는 걸 알았는데.
first_translate: ...means absolutely nothing to me,
I don’t want to part ways with you.
stay with me, siegren.
I don’t want to break up with you.
how could you cry over someone like me...?

hangle: 나 때문에 울 정도로 고민하지 마.
first_translate: don’t worry yourself sick over me, fiona.
fiona...
you can’t expect me to be okay after hearing that.
no, I won’t be alright without you.
what made you change your mind?
it isn’t that you’re a burden to me.
rather, I find myself wanting you more and more each passing day.

hangle: 네가 이 마음을 알면 부담스러워 할 것 같았어.
first_translate: I worried that once you found out, you might start seeing me differently.
there’s no chance of that happening.
then...
from now on,
let me take control of you.
I promise I won’t scare you, siegren.
let’s spend forever together.
I swear to make you happy while standing beside me.
fiona...
haha...
a-are you laughing?!
I meant every single word I said--
fiona.

hangle: 어린 시절 네가 나를 위해 울어줬을 때부터
first_translate: even before you cried for me during our childhood days,
I loved you from that very moment onward.
I love you too.
I won’t run away any longer.

hangle: 걱정도 안 시키고, 네 옆에 꼭 붙어있을 거야
first_translate: not only will I never cause you to worry again, but I’ll stick close to you wherever you may go.
from now on, I’ll get jealous whenever necessary.

hangle: 상대가 나보다 훨씬 좋은 여자라 해도 순순히 헤어져 주지 않을 거고.
first_translate: even if there comes another woman far greater than me, I won’t give you up easily either.
do whatever you wish.
I belong to you alone.
fiona.

hangle: 너는 항상 나를 잘 가지고 있어야 해.
first_translate: always hold onto me tightly.

hangle: 마음속에서 차오르는 기쁨에 질식할 것 같다.
first_translate: I'm overwhelmed with joy welling up inside my heart.
once you cross this line, there’s no turning back.
this is what I wished for.
at last,
nothing can reverse what has transpired.

hangle: 독자님들의 사랑과 관심으로 <내 남자 주인공의 아내가 되었다> 시즌 2가 무사히 마무리되었습니다. 작가님들의 휴식과 재정비 기간을 가지고 더 아름답고 재밌는 시즌 3으로 찾아뵙겠습니다. 앞으로도 많은 기대와 사랑 부탁드립니다. 감사합니다.
first_translate: Dear readers, thanks to your love and support, Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of My Male Lead” has come to its end. After taking some time to rest and recharge, we hope to return with an even more beautiful and exciting season three! We ask that you continue showing us your love and anticipation until then. Thank you.
